availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William S. Bearden (Paducah, McCracken County, Kentucky resident, ship carpenter.)

body.p: Paducah, McCracken County, Kentucky ship carpenter. Married to Cleopatra Bearden. Father of William Bearden,Resident in McCracken County in 1850. Ship carpenter in McCracken County, Kentucky in 1860. Merchant in McCracken County in June 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McCracken County, Paducah and Suburbs, p. 152A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McCracken County, Paducah, 1st District, p. 979.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McCracken County, Division No. 1 Paducah, p. 137B.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), McCracken County, KY, June 1863, p. 2 (accessed via Ancestry.com).
